statements: SELECT * FROM UserPreferences
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM UserPreferences
SELECT playlist_name, favorite_genre FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY favorite_genre DESC
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Rock'
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM UserPreferences WHERE playlist_name = 'Workout'
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre, playlist_name FROM UserPreferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Pop'
SELECT playlist_name, favorite_genre, user_id FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT favorite_genre FROM UserPreferences WHERE playlist_name = 'Chill'
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE favorite_genre IN ('Rock', 'Hip-Hop')
SELECT user_id, playlist_name FROM UserPreferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Jazz' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM user_preferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT playlist_id, user_id, genre FROM playlists WHERE genre IN ('Rock', 'Hip Hop') ORDER BY playlist_id ASC;
SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences JOIN playlists ON user_preferences.user_id = playlists.user_id WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_id, genre, playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY genre ASC;
SELECT playlist_id, user_id, genre, playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE genre = 'Rock' OR genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY playlist_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, favorite_genre FROM user_preferences WHERE favorite_genre LIKE '%Jazz%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE genre = 'Hip Hop' AND playlist_name LIKE 'Best%' ORDER BY playlist_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT genre_name FROM MusicGenres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, playlist_name, created_at FROM UserPlaylists WHERE genre_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM UserPreferences WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM UserPreferences WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, playlist_name, genre_name FROM UserPlaylists JOIN MusicGenres ON UserPlaylists.genre_id = MusicGenres.genre_id;

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, genre_name FROM UserPreferences JOIN UserPlaylists ON UserPreferences.user_id = UserPlaylists.user_id JOIN MusicGenres ON UserPlaylists.genre_id = MusicGenres.genre_id;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name, created_at FROM UserPlaylists ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, rock FROM user_preferences WHERE pop = true;
SELECT playlist_name, user_id FROM playlists ORDER BY playlist_id DESC;
SELECT song_title, artist FROM songs WHERE genre = 'pop';
SELECT song_id, user_id FROM recommended_songs WHERE user_id = 123;

SELECT playlist_name, genre FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT song_title, artist FROM songs WHERE genre = 'rock';
SELECT playlist_name, song_id FROM playlists JOIN recommended_songs ON playlists.user_id = recommended_songs.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(song_id) FROM recommended_songs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users WHERE age < 30;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, genre_name FROM user_preferences JOIN genres ON user_preferences.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM playlists ORDER BY playlist_name DESC;
SELECT users.username, genres.genre_name FROM users JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id JOIN genres ON user_preferences.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM recommendations WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS playlist_count FROM playlists GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
